courses.title: Front End Development,5cr
courses.desc: Bootstrap, jQuery, Media Queries, Single-Page Application, Request-Response model, GET and POST requests, connecting to the back-end, AJAX request-response model, JSON as AJAX response format

courses.title: Data Management and Databases, 5cr
courses.desc: Relational database, SQL queries, database transactions, database design methodology, database diagrams

courses.title: Server Programming, 5cr
courses.desc: Software frameworks for server side programming (Spring Boot), Thymeleaf template engine, REST-API, JSON, version management, build automation tools, deployment tools.

courses.title: Introduction to Java Programming, 3cr (Metropolia UAS)
courses.desc: Algorithms, Java variables, programming statements, expressions and operators, metods, arrays, OOP basics

courses.title: Software Development Technologies, 5cr
courses.desc: Scrum, NodeJS, ReactJS, Redux and Redux Dev Tools, PostMan, Axios, MariaDB, Git

courses.title: Software Project, 10cr
courses.desc: Creating sample client-oriented software product with Scrum methods, back- and front-end design. Technologies used: NodeJS, Express, ReactJS, Redux and Redux Dev Tools, PostMan, AJAX with Axios, MariaDB, Git

courses.title: Multidisciplinary Software Project, 15cr
courses.desc: This course will be implemented as a project, with project management methods. Student will sign a project contract with Haaga-Helia at the start of the course. Students will be assigned to certain teams based on prior knowledge, available projects, required and mastered language (Finnish and/or English) and needs of each project. Students will implement and demonstrate ready-to-use solutions to the customer. Students will learn the needs of the customer, specify and plan the solution and agree with the customer upon the used technologies, that are the best-suited ones for this problem, considering also the teamâ€™s initial skill level and learning goals.

courses.title: Mobile App Development Using React Native, 3 cr (Metropolia UAS)
courses.desc: React, React Native, Expo and Snack; component, prop, state, style, layout, image, text input, touch handling, HTTP, and deployment

courses.title: Android App Development, 5cr
courses.desc: Introduction to app creation and Android App Studio, Creation of new Android project, Setting up Android App Studio interface environment, Basic use of Android App Studio, Testing with the Android emulator, Enabling support for different screen sizes and pixel densities for Android model and devices, Publishing the app on the Google Play store

courses.title: Server Technologies, 5cr
courses.desc: Installing Windows Server OS, system services and service management, Windows Active Directory, network protocols, basics of Linux server environment, MEAN stack

courses.title: Data Security, 5cr
courses.desc: Risk management and network security, types of threats, OWASP, identity and access management, security testing (Kali Linux penetration tests)

courses.title: Cloud Service Technologies, 5cr
courses.desc: Induvidual prject dedicted to CI/CD with Azure Cloud DevOps Services

courses.title: Front End Development, 5cr
courses.desc: Bootstrap, jQuery, Media Queries, Single-Page Application, Request-Response model, GET and POST requests, connecting to the back-end, AJAX request-response model, JSON as AJAX response format
